definitions.definition: A board game for two players in which the players each have a set number of pieces (typically 12 or 20, depending on the rule set), known as men , and the object is to capture each of the opponent 's pieces by jumping one's own pieces over the opponent's pieces.
definitions.label_groups: board games , UK , Ireland , Commonwealth , uncountable

main_definition: ( board games , UK , Ireland , Commonwealth , uncountable ) A board game for two players in which the players each have a set number of pieces (typically 12 or 20, depending on the rule set), known as men , and the object is to capture each of the opponent 's pieces by jumping one's own pieces over the opponent's pieces.
